Leonardo Augusto Martucci

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/5707768181582593
  • Última atualização do currículo em 10/12/2012

Possui graduação em Engenharia Elétrica pela Universidade de São Paulo (2000), mestrado em Engenharia Elétrica pela Universidade de São Paulo (2002) e doutorado em Ciência da Computação pela Universidade de Karlstad - Suécia (2009). Tem experiência na área de Engenharia Elétrica, com ênfase em Redes de Computadores, atuando principalmente nos seguintes temas: segurança e privacidade em redes de computadores, com ênfase em redes de computadores móveis e distribuídas. (Texto informado pelo autor)

Produção bibliográfica
Capítulos de livros publicados
1.
ANDERSSON, C. ; MARTUCCI, L. A. ; HÜBNER, S.F . Privacy and Anonymity in Mobile Ad Hoc Networks. In: David Taniar. (Org.). Mobile Computing: Concepts, Methodologies, Tools, and Applications. 1ed.Hershey, PA, USA: Information Science Reference, 2008, v. 5, p. -.

2.
ANDERSSON, C. ; MARTUCCI, L. A. ; HÜBNER, S.F . Privacy and Anonymity in Mobile Ad Hoc Networks. In: Yan Zhang; Jun Zheng; Miao Ma. (Org.). Handbook of Research on Wireless Security. 1ed.Hershey, PA, USA: Information Science Reference, 2008, v. 2, p. 431-448.

3.
HÜBNER, S.F ; KESDOGAN, D. ; MARTUCCI, L. A. . Privacy and Privacy-Enhancing Technologies. In: Steven M. Furnell; Sokratis Katsikas; Javier Lopez; Ahmed Patel. (Org.). Securing Information and Communications Systems: Principles, Technologies, and Applications. 1ed.Boston, MA, USA: Artech House Publishers, 2008, v. , p. 213-242.

Trabalhos completos publicados em anais de congressos
1.
ZHANG, G. ; HÜBNER, S.F ; MARTUCCI, L. A. ; EHLERT, S. . Revealing the Calling History of SIP VoIP Systems by Timing Attacks. In: International Conference on Availability, Reliability and Security, 2009, Fukuoka, Japan. Proceedings of the 4th International Conference on Availability, Reliability and Security (ARES 2009). Washington, DC, USA: IEEE Computer Society, 2009. p. 135-142.

2.
ANDERSSON, C. ; KOHLWEISS, M. ; MARTUCCI, L. A. ; PANCHENKO, A. . A Self-Certified and Sybil-Free Framework for Secure Digital Identity Domain Buildup. In: Second IFIP WG 11.2 International Workshop (WISTP 2008), 2008, Seville, Spain. Information Security Theory and Practices. Smart Devices, Convergence and Next Generation Networks. Berlin: Springer, 2008. v. 5019. p. 64-77.

3.
MARTUCCI, L. A.; KOHLWEISS, M. ; ANDERSSON, C. ; PANCHENKO, A. . Self-certified Sybil-free Pseudonyms. In: ACM Conference on Wireless Network Security, 2008, Alexandria, VA, USA. Proceedings of the first ACM Conference on Wireless Network Security. New York, NY, USA: ACM, 2008. p. 154-159.

4.
MARTUCCI, L. A.; ZUCCATO, A. ; HÜBNER, S.F . Identity Deployment and Management in Wireless Mesh Networks. In: 3rd IFIP WG 9.2, 9.6/11.6, 11.7 / FIDIS International Summer School, 2008, Karlstad, Sweden. The Future of Identity in the Information Society. New York, NY, USA: Springer, 2007. p. 223-233.

5.
LINDSKOG, S. ; HEDBOM, H. ; MARTUCCI, L. A. ; HÜBNER, S.F . Experiences from Educating Practitioners in Vulnerability Analysis. In: Fifth World Conference on Information Security Education, 2007, West Point, NY, USA. Fifth World Conference on Information Security Education. Boston, MA, USA: Springer, 2007. v. 237. p. 73-80.

6.
MARTUCCI, L. A.; HEDBOM, H. ; LINDSKOG, S. ; HÜBNER, S.F . Educating System Testers in Vulnerability Analysis: Laboratory Development and Deployment. In: 7th Workshop on Education in Computer Security (WECS7), 2006, Monterey, CA. Proceedings of the 7th Workshop on Education in Computer Security. Monterey, CA: The Center for Information Systems Security Studies and Research at the Naval Postgraduate School, 2006. p. 51-66.

7.
MARTUCCI, L. A.; ANDERSSON, C. ; HÜBNER, S.F . Chameleon and the Identity-Anonymity Paradox: Anonymity in Mobile Ad Hoc Networks. In: First International Workshop on Security, 2006, Kyoto, Japan. Proceedings of the 1st International Workshop on Security (IWSEC 2006) - Short Papers. Tokyo, Japan: Information Processing Society of Japan (IPSJ), 2006. p. 123-134.

8.
MARTUCCI, L. A.; ANDERSSON, C. ; SCHREURS, W. ; HÜBNER, S.F . Trusted Server Model for Privacy-Enhanced Location Based Service. In: 11th Nordic Workshop on Secure IT Systems, 2006, Linköping, Sweden. Proceedings of the 11th Nordic Workshop on Secure IT Systems (NordSec 2006), 2006. p. 13-25.

9.
ANDERSSON, C. ; MARTUCCI, L. A. ; HÜBNER, S.F . Requirements for Privacy-Enhancements in Mobile Ad Hoc Networks. In: 3rd German Workshop on Mobile Ad-Hoc Networks - WMAN 2005, 2005, Bonn. Lecture Notes in Informatics (LNI) - Informatik 2005. Bonn: Gesellschaft für Informatik e.V. (GI), 2005. v. P68. p. 344-348.

10.
MARTUCCI, L. A.; SCHWEITZER, C. M. ; VENTURINI, Y. R. ; CARVALHO, T. C. M. B. ; RUGGIERO, W. V. . A Trust-Based Security Architecture for Small and Medium-Sized Ad Hoc Netorks. In: Third Annual Mediterranean Ad Hoc Networking Workshop, 2004, Bodrum. Proceedings of the Third Annual Mediterranean Ad Hoc Networking Workshop. Istanbul: Yavuz, 2004. p. 278-290.

11.
MARTUCCI, L. A.; CARVALHO, T. C. M. B. ; RUGGIERO, W. V. . A Lightweight Distributed Group Authentication Mechanism. In: Fourth International Network Conference - INC 2004, 2004, Plymouth. Proceedings of the Fourth International Network Conference - INC 2004. Plymouth: University of Plymouth, 2004. p. 393-400.

12.
MARTUCCI, L. A.; CARVALHO, T. C. M. B. ; RUGGIERO, W. V. . Domínios Virtuais para Redes Móveis Ad Hoc. In: XXI Simpósio Brasileiro de Redes de Computadores, 2003, Natal - RN. Anais do XXI Simpósio Brasileiro de Redes de Computadores. Natal - RN: SBC - Sociedade Brasileira de Computação, 2003. v. 2. p. 599-614.

13.
VENTURINI, Y. R. ; SCHWEITZER, C. M. ; MARTUCCI, L. A. ; REDIGOLO, F. F. ; MITTELSDORF, A. W. ; RUGGIERO, W. V. ; CARVALHO, T. C. M. B. . Security Model for Ad Hoc Networks. In: International Conference on Wireless Networks - ICWN'02, 2002, Las Vegas. Proceedings of the International Conference on Wireless Networks. Las Vegas: CSREA Press, 2002. v. 1. p. 185-191.
